com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core

Class DevTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.DevTools

  • public class DevTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows data for developers. Also has some tools like buttons to edito the map.
